bibl.title: Chartae Latinae Antiquiores. Facsimile-Edition of the Latin Charters Prior to the Ninth Century. Part V. The United States of America I.
bibl.note: Ch.L.A. V, 276-308. - Ann Arbor (Mich.), University of Michigan Library; - Berkeley (Calif.), University of California Collection; - Cleveland (Ohio), Western Reserve University Library.
bibl.seg: Bruckner Albert and Robert Marichal, Chartae Latinae Antiquiores. Facsimile-Edition of the Latin Charters Prior to the Ninth Century. Part V. The United States of America I.
Dietikon - Zürich, Urs Graf Verlag, 1975, in fol., xi-69 pp., ill.
Ch.L.A. V, 276-308. - Ann Arbor (Mich.), University of Michigan Library; - Berkeley (Calif.), University of California Collection; - Cleveland (Ohio), Western Reserve University Library.

C.R. par B. Bischoff, HZ 223 (1976) pp. 689-696 (concerne aussi Ch.L.A. III-IV). - Ettore Cau, Scriptorium 31 (1977) pp. 302-304 (concerne aussi Ch.L.A. VI-VII). - Armando Petrucci, Gnomon 51 (1979) pp. 26-31 (concerne Ch.L.A. V-VIII). - Günter Poethke, ArchPF 24-25 (1976) pp. 189-190.
